work.company: Raytheon Technologies: Raytheon Missiles and Defense
work.summary: Production of missile defense weapon systems for military support
highlights: Production of two missile defense systems for military support
Utilize computer systems to track, update, search, locate and maintain production materials, supplies, any other pertinent documentation needed for Production operations

Perform all tasks related to inventory and receiving; shipping and packaging functions necessary in the movement of Company material and in conjunction with the MRP/SAP methods for material/workload control
Proficient Computer Skills in Word, Excel, Access, and Outlook
Perform in-process inspections in accordance with company standards and customer specifications
Experience with the use of common hand instruments such as screwdrivers, sockets, ratchets, etc

work.company: United Parcel Service: Supply Chain Solutions
work.summary: Manage and control inventory for customer accounts like Toshiba and Hewlett Packard
highlights: Utilize DBMS to oversee and maintain accurate and efficient inventory control for large-scale accounts
Perform cycle counts to ensure accuracy levels
Resolve inventory discrepancies using root cause analysis
Highly skills in Microsoft Word, Excel, Access, Powerpoint, and Outlook
Great experience with Warehouse; Receiving; Inventory Control; Shipping; or Material Handling

Proactive and solution-oriented to determine how to better satisfy customers when reviewing backorders, researching alternate sources for backorder parts, communicating with locations, and updating all backorder information on the purchase orders
Reply to and complete customer email request and tasks to ensure customer satisfaction
Familiar with supply chain operations and flow of practices and procedures necessary to meet goals
